content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and steam engine (position not specified).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is currently not powered.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is currently not powered.

### PipeGroup at position(-11.5, 20.5)
Consists of a group of pipes (positions -11.5, 20.5 to -11.5, 24.5) that are part of the fluid system.

### ElectricityGroup at position(-17.5, 9.5)
Consists of multiple small electric poles (positions not specified) that are currently not providing power to nearby entities.

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) which is currently not smelting due to no ingredients.

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) which is currently not smelting due to no ingredients.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there are no obstructions in the vicinity before attempting to place electric poles near other entities like labs or assembling machines.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check the power supply to entities such as labs and assembling machines. Ensure that they are connected to a functioning electricity network.

### Errors when picking up entities
- Ensure that the entity being picked up is not part of a group that is currently in use or connected to other entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
